SEARCH
Package entity

Class Administrator

Object
User
Administrator
public class Administrator extends User
Represents an Administrator in the system who manages staff, processes replenishment requests, and oversees inventory actions related to medicines.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final List<MedicineInventoryAction>
    inventoryActions
    The list of medicine inventory actions performed by this administrator.
    private final Set<User>
    managedStaff
    The set of users that this administrator manages (staff members).
    private final List<ReplenishmentRequest>
    processedRequests
    The list of replenishment requests that have been processed by this administrator.

    Fields inherited from class User

    hospitalId, name, password

  • Constructor Details

    • Administrator

      public Administrator(String hospitalId, String password, String name)
      Constructs a new Administrator with the given hospital ID, password, and name.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID of the administrator.
      password - The password of the administrator.
      name - The name of the administrator.

  • Method Details

    • addStaffMember

      public void addStaffMember(User staff)
      Adds a staff member to the list of managed staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member to be added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff member is invalid or is an Administrator.

    • removeStaffMember

      public void removeStaffMember(User staff)
      Removes a staff member from the list of managed staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff member does not exist in the managed staff.

    • updateStaffMember

      public void updateStaffMember(User staff)
      Updates a staff member's details in the managed staff list.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member to be updated.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff member does not exist in the managed staff.

    • processReplenishmentRequest

      public void processReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest request, boolean approve)
      Processes a replenishment request by either approving or rejecting it.
      Parameters:
      request - The replenishment request to process.
      approve - A boolean indicating whether to approve or reject the request.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request is invalid or already processed.

    • updateMedicineStock

      public void updateMedicineStock(Medicine medicine, int quantity, String reason)
      Updates the stock of a medicine by a certain quantity and records the action.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The medicine whose stock is being updated.
      quantity - The quantity to add or subtract from the medicine stock.
      reason - The reason for the stock update.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid.

    • updateMedicineLowStockAlert

      public void updateMedicineLowStockAlert(Medicine medicine, int newAlertLevel)
      Updates the low stock alert level for a given medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The medicine whose low stock alert is being updated.
      newAlertLevel - The new alert level for the medicine's stock.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid.

    • getManagedStaff

      public List<User> getManagedStaff()
      Returns a list of all staff members managed by this administrator.
      Returns:
      A list of managed staff members.

    • getManagedStaffByRole

      public List<User> getManagedStaffByRole(Class<? extends User> role)
      Returns a list of staff members managed by this administrator filtered by role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of staff members to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of managed staff members with the specified role.

    • getProcessedRequests

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getProcessedRequests()
      Returns a list of all replenishment requests that have been processed by this administrator.
      Returns:
      A list of processed replenishment requests.

    • getInventoryActions

      public List<MedicineInventoryAction> getInventoryActions()
      Returns a list of all medicine inventory actions performed by this administrator.
      Returns:
      A list of inventory actions.

    • getInventoryActionsByDate

      public List<MedicineInventoryAction> getInventoryActionsByDate(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Returns a list of medicine inventory actions performed by this administrator within a given date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the range.
      endDate - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of inventory actions performed within the specified date range.

    • getInventoryActionsByMedicine

      public List<MedicineInventoryAction> getInventoryActionsByMedicine(Medicine medicine)
      Returns a list of medicine inventory actions performed by this administrator for a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      medicine - The medicine to filter actions by.
      Returns:
      A list of inventory actions for the specified medicine.
